data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Real Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Barcelona push forward at Camp Nou and Lionel Messi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Real Sociedad defence.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Barcelona, Barcelona push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Real Sociedad awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Barcelona's Antoine Griezmann misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelona.
In the minute 10, In Barcelona, Pedri (Barcelona) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Sociedad goal kick.
Adnan Januzaj for Real Sociedad gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 11, Goal kick for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Barcelona to take a throw-in in Real Sociedad territory.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a Barcelona throw-in in Real Sociedad's half.
In the minute 17, Sergino Dest (Barcelona) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in Real Sociedad.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards the away team a throw-in.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 20, Adnan Januzaj (Real Sociedad) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Real Sociedad.
In the minute 23, In Barcelona Barcelona attack through Lionel Messi. The finish is off target, however.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards Real Sociedad a goal kick.
Real Sociedad are caught offside.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Barcelona.
At Camp Nou, Barcelona are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 26, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
Real Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Willian Jose.
In the minute 27, That's a fine assist from Portu.
Jordi Alba grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Camp Nou.
Real Sociedad push upfield but Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Real Sociedad.
Free kick Real Sociedad.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Real Sociedad get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
Ball safe as Real Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Real Sociedad pushes forward through Adnan Januzaj, whose finish on goal is saved.
Barcelona drive into the zone and Antoine Griezmann is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Barcelona are coming forward and Martin Braithwaite gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 38, Real Sociedad have a goal kick.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) has received a yellow card from Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
Goal! Frenkie De Jong gives Barcelona a 2-1 lead.
In the minute 45, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
Real Sociedad advance rapidly upfield but Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez blows for offside.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Barcelona.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Barcelona.
The second-half is underway at Camp Nou.
Barcelona needs to be cautious. Real Sociedad have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 47, Can Real Sociedad get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
In Barcelona Barcelona drive forward through Lionel Messi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Barcelona, Barcelona push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 49, Barcelona push upfield but Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Real Sociedad in the half of Barcelona.
Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Antoine Griezmann for Barcelona drives towards goal at Camp Nou. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 56, Antoine Griezmann gets his shot on target but fails to score for Barcelona.
The away team replace Ander Guevara with Robert Navarro.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Ander Barrenetxea is replacing Adnan Januzaj for Real Sociedad at Camp Nou.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
Ander Barrenetxea is booked for the away team.
In the minute 59, Free kick Barcelona.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad at Camp Nou.
Throw-in Barcelona.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in the half of Barcelona.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 64, Real Sociedad make their third substitution with Alexander Isak replacing Portu.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ronald Koeman is making the team's first substitution at Camp Nou with Trincao replacing Antoine Griezmann.
Carles Alena is on a sub for Sergio Busquets for Barcelona.
In the minute 67, Throw-in high up the field for Real Sociedad in Barcelona.
Mikel Merino of Real Sociedad smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a Real Sociedad throw-in in Barcelona's half.
Real Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
Real Sociedad have a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Barcelona to check on Pedri, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 74, The home team has substituted Pedri with Miralem Pjanic. Ronald Koeman is thus making his third change.
Real Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 77, Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Real Sociedad advance rapidly upfield but Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez blows for offside.
Real Sociedad drive upfield and Mikel Merino gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Barcelona defender.
In the minute 79, Real Sociedad's Nacho Monreal gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Clement Lenglet is replacing Oscar Mingueza for the home team.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
Robin Le Normand (Real Sociedad) has received a first yellow card.
Attention is being given to Barcelonaâ€™s Lionel Messi and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 82, Lionel Messi returns to the field for Barcelona after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Real Sociedad.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Real Sociedad's Willian Jose is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Real Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team have replaced Robin Le Normand with Modibo Sagnan. This is the fourth substitution made today by Imanol Alguacil.
In the minute 86, In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelona.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
In the minute 88, Barcelona's Trincao has been booked in Barcelona.
Free kick Barcelona.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Real Sociedad.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
Carles Alena (Barcelona) gets a yellow card.
